en.title: FE Welcomes Quantum Bracelet Wearer, Dato' Misbun Sidek, Coach And Former World Class Badminton Player!
en.content: Dato' Mohmed Misbun Sidek is a Malaysian former badminton player who rated among world's leading men's singles players of the 1980s. He is the eldest of the famous six Sidek brothers, all of whom were actively involved in international badminton scene. He has coached Malaysia's leading singles players from the 1990s forward including Rashid, the Hashim brothers, Roslin and Muhammad Hafiz and Lee Chong Wei. Dato' Misbun Sidek recently paid a visit to FE's Headquarter with FE's Spokesman, former Badminton World Champion, Foo Kok Keong. Dato' Misbun has been wearing FE's Quantum Bracelet for the past several years!
